data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SDP::Parser is the Perl interface to SinisterSdp's SDP_Parser C
    library. It contains a low-level event stream parser that breaks SDP
    fields up into events, and a higher-level tree builder that builds a
    tree out of the values in the description using the event stream
    parser.

    I also plan on writing a pure-Perl version of the library as a drop
    in replacement for this XS-hybrid.
